findings.title: Centralized Admin Privileges
findings.description: The full supply of tokens is allocated to one specific address during contract deployment, allowing it to hold complete voting power and execute any proposal without going through the whole voting process.

findings.title: Token susceptible to approve attack
findings.description: Changing an allowance through the `approve()` method brings the risk that someone may use both the old and the new allowance by unfortunate transaction ordering.
